channel.title: General Bus Pissed Public Transportation on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Bus Pissed Public Transportation on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Sometime public transportation sucks
item.description: Jesus. I am on the bus, listening to my “this is hell” podcast and i am all riled up. Pissed really. I waited for almost 45 minutes for the damen bus. That is annoying. Wtf. It isn’t too hard to have a regular bus schedule. Seriously. anger.
